name: Somebody Touched My Spaghat! ( The Game )
name_original: Somebody Touched My Spaghat! ( The Game )
description:
A new year , and another bunch of great memes are on the rise!

This game features a bunch of memes that already went viral in the current year!

Including

  • Somebody Touched My Spaghat!
  • Ugandan Knuckles
  • Logan Paul Suicide Forest Controversy(psst.. this one's hidden..try to find it!)
  • Tide Pods
  • PewDiePie "Can You Do This??"
  • A few more old dead memes to fill in the story
    • THIS GAME CONTAINS ONLY CERTIFIED CHRSITIAN CONTENT
    **Note :   The Game Takes a While To Load .. Don't worry if it says "Not Responding" ..It'll load in a while**
